description: Fix all TypeScript errors in inventory management components

workstreams.description: Analyze components and create type definitions
Fix dashboard, overview, and metrics components
Fix item and stock management components

workstreams.notes: Components already well-typed, no fixes needed

decisions.decision: Create comprehensive type definitions for all inventory data structures
decisions.rationale: Centralized type definitions ensure consistency and maintainability
decisions.outcome: Successfully added 15 new type definitions to /types/inventory.ts

decisions.decision: Fix components in order of dependency - core types first, then consumers
decisions.rationale: Bottom-up approach minimizes errors and rework

decisions.decision: Use inline type annotations for map/filter/reduce callbacks
decisions.rationale: Provides immediate clarity and avoids namespace pollution
decisions.outcome: Eliminated all implicit 'any' errors in callback functions

decisions.decision: Apply replace_all for repeated error patterns in inventoryApi.ts
decisions.rationale: Efficient fix for identical error patterns across multiple locations
decisions.outcome: Fixed 5 error locations in single operation
